availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leonard Stom (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer and carpenter )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of Jacob H. Stom and Margaret Stom. Married to Angeline M. Stom. Father of Forest Stom and Margaret Stom. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Carpenter in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 159A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 820.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Paradise, p. 555A.
"Leonard Stom (1828-1900)," Find A Grave, Memorial #/136590971, accessed December 20, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/136590971.
